site.title: My Code Journey
site.tagline: A safeplace where I share my thoughts, tutorials and projects about web development and programming.

nuxtSiteConfig.name: 'Federico Ibba - Portfolio & Blog
nuxtSiteConfig.description: 'Welcome to my personal portfolio and blog! I am Federico Ibba, a passionate developer and tech enthusiast. Here you will find my latest projects, articles, and insights into the world of technology.

about.title: Federico Ibba
about.description: Software Engineer passionate about Web Development

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: My journey with Computer Science started when I was four and I liked to play games in my father PC using MS-DOS. Today I am a Software Engineer, passionate about Web Development and mainly focused on Frontend. I like to work with Typescript, Vue, Nuxt, but also AWS, ExpressJS and NestJS.

goals.title: Current Goals
goals.content: In the last months, I am studying to learn more about the Backend things I miss, so that I can accomplish my dream to be an Architect one day.

techStack.description: Technologies I work with and currently learning

softwareEngineer.title: Software Engineer
softwareEngineer.description: Current job where I use Vue and Nuxt. I am member of the company Developer Experience Team and Technical Decision Authority.

frontendDeveloper.title: Frontend Developer
frontendDeveloper.description: Worked for two years with Angular and React applications

fullStackDeveloperMistralPay.title: Full Stack Developer
fullStackDeveloperMistralPay.description: Worked for six months with React-based applications (pure and with Next.js), AWS (API Gateway, Lambda, S3, DynamoDB)

fullStackDeveloperUniversity.title: Full Stack Developer
fullStackDeveloperUniversity.description: Worked for two years creating Business Intelligence dashboards using Angular, ExpressJS, MySQL.

fellowResearch.title: Fellow Research
fellowResearch.description: Worked on Machine Learning Applications: a decision-tree based one and a topic-based message polarity classification algorithm.

teacher.title: Teacher of Computer Science for kids
teacher.description: Taught children aged between 9 and 11 years old a visual programming language called Scratch.

earlyBeginnings.title: Early Beginnings
earlyBeginnings.description: Started with MS-DOS games at age 4
